channel.title: Metropolis - Symphony of Fear
channel.itunes:author: Abel Korzeniowski
channel.description: A preview of the 147 minute new score for Fritz Lang's silent film Metropolis (1926) by Abel Korzeniowski
channel.itunes:subtitle: new score (2004) for Fritz Lang's silent film Metropolis by Abel Korzeniowski
channel.itunes:summary: A preview of the 147 minute new orchestral score for Fritz Lang's silent movie "Metropolis" (1926) by Abel Korzeniowski. This dark, moody soundtrack is a journey into the underlworld of human mind.
channel.itunes:keywords: Abel, Abel Korzeniowski, Korzeniowski, Metropolis, soundtrack, music, classical, film, film music, silent film, movies, orchestral, new, score, symphony, epic, LOTR
